hands-on.translation[0].definitions[0].d: doing something yourself rather than just talking about it or telling other people to do it
hands-on.translation[0].definitions[0].e: a chance to get some hands-on experience of the job
He has a very hands-on approach to management.

hands-on.translation[1].definitions[0].e: She intends to continue being very much a hands-on manager.
